duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with clients to advise and assist in making purchases that align with their needs and personal style.
Achieve and exceed sales goals and key retail KPIs.
Develop and foster long-lasting client relationships through engaging conversation and active clientele management.
Proactively reach out to existing clients and develop new clients to drive business and sales goals.
Maintain company merchandise presentation standards and follow-up on customer charge sends, repairs, and holds.
Develop and maintain product knowledge and analyze personal KPI achievement, proposing adjustments to sales approach.
Support in inventory preparation and execution and maintain a collaborative work environment with all store employees.
